projects.title: PhantomBook
projects.brief: An augmented reality e-book interaction technique supports tangible interactions for page navigation.

projects.title: RichReview
projects.brief: A multi-modal annotation system supports rich collaboration through voice + gesture expressions.

projects.title: SimpleSpeech
projects.brief: A transcription-based voice editing system reduces workloads in speech commenting.

projects.title: Grasp + Micro-mobility
projects.brief: Employing capacitive grip sensing and inertial motion can capture contexts of collaborative interactions.

projects.title: TextTearing
projects.brief: A pen + touch gesture expands writing space in a fluid document layout.

projects.title: TouchBookmark
projects.brief: A multi-touch gesture supports nonlinear page navigation through a set of lightweight bookmarking interactions.

projects.title: Mobiature
projects.brief: Using the smartphone as a 3D controller supports direct manipulation of an on-screen virtual object.
